name: The Man in The Fields 2.0
description:
The Man in the Fields 2.0: 

Updated for proper optimization and more difficult gameplay.

The enemy phases in and out of visibility, sometimes partially, and totally for up to 5 seconds. Listen for the footsteps. The enemy also has more vocalizations, and is faster than in the original release. 

Story: Exhausted by your poverty, you have performed the ritual of the Man in the Fields in hopes of a year of good fortune. Enter your house without delay, and close all open cupboards and drawers. Beware of the enemy; he will not let you complete his challenge easily, and if you lose the game, you lose your head.
